Class SessionUtils

java.lang.Object
  SessionUtils

public class SessionUtils
extends java.lang.Object

Static utilities. Handles large chunks of code for Session, and SessionManager.

Method Detail

acceptNewClient

public static void acceptNewClient(java.net.Socket client,
                                   Session s)
Runs on SERVER Sever got a connection. Setup some logicals, this is step 1.

Parameters:
client - Socket that client connected on.
s - Session socket connected to. This makes a new connection entry in the s.networkMembers<> Arraylist Note this is a Server <--> Client new-connection handler not a Peer <--> Peer new-connection handler YET!

requestSessionJoin

public static void requestSessionJoin(Session s,
                                      NetworkBundle peer,
                                      NetworkObject.reason reason)
Runs on CLIENT Client connected to another machine. Client is trying to send a message to say "Hi, I'm here, and my name is ***"

Parameters:
s - A session where the localUser, and master objects are mostly setup.
reason - Why we are making connection. Join Session, or Join Peer are valid reasons.

buildSession

public static Session buildSession(Member m,
                                   DrawingCanvas c,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<ToolController> tools,
                                   ChatPanelView chatPanel,
                                   ControlPanelView controlPanel)
Method to create a Master Session.

Parameters:
m - Member who will be the master.
c - Canvas, will be in focus of the Session created.
Returns:
Returns an operation Session, if the port is available, else null.

buildSession

public static Session buildSession(Member m,
                                   DrawingCanvas c,
                                   java.lang.String ip,
                                   int port,
                                   java.util.ArrayList<ToolController> tools,
                                   ChatPanelView chatPanel,
                                   ControlPanelView controlPanel)
Build a client session, will try to connect to another server.

Parameters:
m - Local member, will be a client of the session.
c - DrawingCanvas that will be in focus of the session.
ip - Ip to connect to.
port - Port to connect to.
Returns:
Returns a session, if success, else returns null;
